title: Dalton City
description: In this new volume, Lucky Luke has to clean out a whole Fenton Town, so named because it has been taken over by Dean Fenton, a desperado of the worst sort... Fenton Town has become the most depraved city in all of Texas. Lucky Luke makes a short visit to town―just the time needed to put Fenton in prison and chase out the remaining rabble.
author: Morris
